doc:
John Sharian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Sharian 0 John Sharian (born John Shahnazarian) is an American character actor perhaps best known for portraying villain Ivan in The Machinist (2004). John_Sharian ( born John_Shahnazarian ) is an_American_character_actor perhaps best_known for portraying_villain_Ivan in The_Machinist ( 2004 ) .
